director.name: 达尼洛·塞贝德齐哈 Danilo Serbedzija

introduction: The story is about Dražen Petrović. The legendary basketball player was born and raised in Šibenik (where he also took his first steps in basketball), attained national and European glory in Zagreb while playing for Cibona, and ended up in the NBA as one of the most promising European players during the new era for the US professional basketball league. The movie will also cover the 1990s wartime period, when Petrović played for Croatia, his love life, and his tragic, untimely death in a car crash in Germany in 1993.
